scn mwOrdinatorUniformCuirassScript

;script for ordinator armor so people can react to you wearing it

begin OnEquip Player
	set WearingOrdinatorUni to 1
end

begin onUnequip
	If Player.GetEquipped 0indorilShelmet == 1
		return
	else
		set WearingOrdinatorUni  to 0
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
